snippet: The Scion Rock Fest, which took place on Saturday in Tampa, Fla., offered 26 bands playing metal and beyond, with no particular allegiance to locality or subgenre.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performances by several heavy metal music bands at the Scion Rock Fest in Tampa, Fla.
lead_paragraph: The Scion Rock Fest, which took place on Saturday in Tampa, Fla., offered 26 bands playing metal and beyond, with no particular allegiance to locality or subgenre.

headline.seo: 26 Metal Bands at Scion Rock Fest in Tampa, Fla.
headline.main: Metalheads of All Alloys, Swirling Into the Night
headline.print_headline: Metalheads of All Alloys, Swirling Into the Night
